mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_info (user_id, service_type, publish_type, title, content, images, pet_type, location, contact, price, status, view_count, application_count, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{service_type}, #{publish_type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{images}, #{pet_type}, #{location}, #{contact}, #{price}, #{status}, #{view_count}, #{application_count}, #{create_time}, #{update_time})
mapper.select: SELECT si.*, a.username, a.id as avatar FROM service_info si LEFT JOIN account a ON si.user_id = a.id WHERE si.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE service_info SET service_type = #{service_type}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, images = #{images}, pet_type = #{pet_type}, location = #{location}, contact = #{contact}, price = #{price}, update_time = #{update_time} WHERE id = #{id}
